metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Delfino Plaza is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Delfino Plaza has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Major,  and A Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
